body_html:
@girving Thanks for your quick response. I would agree with you when the ResourceExhaustedError would occur on the first loop iteration.

But it is not and so it seems like a session.run accidentally keeps/leaks some memory.

body:
@girving Thanks for your quick response. I would agree with you when the ResourceExhaustedError would occur on the first loop iteration.

But it is not and so it seems like a session.run accidentally keeps/leaks some memory.
